title: Walt Whitman to the Editor of the Century Illustrated Monthly Review, 15 July 1886

person.name: Editor of the Century Illustrated Monthly Review

recipient.name: Editor of the Century Illustrated Monthly Review

people: Editor of the Century Illustrated Monthly Review
text: 758328 Mickle streetCamden N JJuly 15 '86—Thanks for the three slips. I shall keep them carefully in my own hands until I see "Father Taylor" printed in the Magazine—If I am indebted, as I fancy, to the printing office, for the courtesy of the slips please send this card there if convenientWalt Whitman Walt Whitman to the Editor of the Century Illustrated Monthly Review, 15 July 1886
